well,i confirm it works.....and its way better and realistic than fifa...
also, in order to skip the (madly annoying) intro - go to "C:\Program Files\KONAMI\Pro Evolution Soccer 2012 DEMO\img" (or where ever you install the demo) and delete the file "pes12pv.sfd" - voila!
